Literature.Title: Mechanism of action and relationship between structure and biological activity of Ctx-Ha: a new ceratotoxin-like peptide from Hypsiboas albopunctatus.
Literature.Author: Cespedes GF, Lorenzón EN, Vicente EF, Mendes-Giannini MJ, Fontes W, Castro MS, Cilli EM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=1µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=8µM),Candida krusei ATCC 6258(MIC=8µM),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=4µM),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 90012(MIC=8µM)
